Happy Holidays LET!!!

We at Abc-Hosters would like to bring an limit stock of Dedicated Servers to the forum. Located in Ashburn, VA in PhoenixNap Datacenter. This offer is only good for yearly plan and comes with the following specs: 

3 in stock:
**E3-1270 v2**
16 GB ECC DDR3	
1 TB Enterprise Grade SATA III	
15 TB Transfer (1Gbps Uplink)
/29 IP allocation (5 Usable IPv4)	
Linux OS of Choice	or Windows with price of license
PhoenixNap Free DDOS Migration
KVM Access on request
12-48 Hour setup time

**BYOIP:** Bring your own subnet of /24 or more and we announce them.

**Test IP:** 198.24.160.242

**Monthly:** $50
[Order Link](https://abc-billing.us/order/main/packages/Deals/?group_id=6)


Any questions feel free to ask or Visit our site.
